input.sentences: there were a ton of people that were about to show up for the event tonight .
soon the room was completely packed .
everyone was dancing and having a good time .
there were a lot of people chatting together .
the party lasted well into the evening .
output.sentences: There was a party being setup for tonight.
It brought many a number of people together.
They danced, laughed, enjoyed a show, having all sorts of fun.
Some choosing to not be so lively and just enjoying chatter and drink.
All having a good time in their preferred ways.
